work_experience.responsibilities: Manage HR operations including benefits and compensation, payroll, employee relations, policy compliance, and recruitment for corporate and fulfillment centers. Developed staffing strategies, HR policies, training, and associate development programs. Reduced health benefit cost increases from 46% to 5% within the first month. Maintains HRIS systems and ensures compliance with all HR-related regulations.

Partnered with leadership to develop HR policies, processes, and staffing strategies for a major startup operation. Recruited over 220 full-time and 27 management staff while managing 1800 seasonal associates. Developed HR business office infrastructure, managed HR delivery, compliance, and operations across multiple locations. Provided coaching, developed leadership initiatives, and ensured workforce planning and regulatory compliance.

Oversaw HR for two business units with 184 employees. Led merger of five physician practices into a single nonprofit entity. Designed compensation and incentive structures, negotiated salary offers, and recruited executive and physician-level staff. Authored employee manual, implemented performance review systems, and maintained an 85% employee satisfaction rating.

Managed generalist HR duties including recruitment, benefits, disciplinary processes, and HR support staff. Contributed to opening a 1.2 million sq. ft. distribution center, hiring over 400 employees. Implemented morale-boosting programs, conducted harassment investigations, and maintained staffing levels for 878 hourly employees across three shifts.

projects.name: HR Department Startups
projects.description: Successfully established HR departments for three new organizations, creating HR infrastructure, processes, and compliance frameworks.

projects.name: Healthcare Organization Merger
projects.description: Led HR integration for merger of five physician practices into a single nonprofit health organization, including staffing and compensation planning.
